<h3 id="X372">X(372)&nbsp;=&nbsp;{X(3),X(6)}-HARMONIC CONJUGATE OF X(371)</h3>
Trilinears&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; cos(A + &pi;/4) : :
<br>
Trilinears&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; cos A - sin A : :
<br>
Trilinears&nbsp;&nbsp; a(S<sub>A</sub> - S) : :
<br>
Trilinears&nbsp;&nbsp; a(b<sup>2</sup> + c<sup>2</sup> - a<sup>2</sup> - 2S) : :
<br>
Barycentrics&nbsp;&nbsp; sin A cos(A + &pi;/4) : :
<b><br>
X(372) = 3 X[2] + X[43133], 2 X[640] + X[43133], 3 X[6] - 4 X[44481], 3 X[6] - 2 X[44501], X[1151] - 3 X[12968], 2 X[1505] + X[40275], 2 X[6221] - 5 X[41411], X[11824] - 4 X[43121], X[11824] + 2 X[45488], 3 X[35841] - 8 X[44481], 3 X[35841] - 4 X[44501], 2 X[43121] + X[45488], X[3071] - 3 X[32788], 2 X[3071] - 3 X[35823], X[3071] + 3 X[41946], 2 X[3071] + X[42267], 3 X[3071] - X[42271], 5 X[3071] + 3 X[43209], X[3071] + 6 X[52048], 2 X[7584] - 3 X[32788], 4 X[7584] - X[35821], 4 X[7584] - 3 X[35823], 2 X[7584] + 3 X[41946], 2 X[7584] + X[42259], 4 X[7584] + X[42267], 6 X[7584] - X[42271], 10 X[7584] + 3 X[43209], X[7584] + 3 X[52048], 6 X[32788] - X[35821], 3 X[32788] + X[42259], 6 X[32788] + X[42267], 9 X[32788] - X[42271], 5 X[32788] + X[43209], X[32788] + 2 X[52048], X[35821] - 3 X[35823], X[35821] + 6 X[41946], X[35821] + 2 X[42259], 3 X[35821] - 2 X[42271], 5 X[35821] + 6 X[43209], X[35821] + 12 X[52048], X[35823] + 2 X[41946], 3 X[35823] + 2 X[42259], 3 X[35823] + X[42267], 9 X[35823] - 2 X[42271], 5 X[35823] + 2 X[43209], X[35823] + 4 X[52048], 3 X[41946] - X[42259], 6 X[41946] - X[42267], 9 X[41946] + X[42271], 5 X[41946] - X[43209], 3 X[42259] + X[42271], 5 X[42259] - 3 X[43209], X[42259] - 6 X[52048], 3 X[42267] + 2 X[42271], 5 X[42267] - 6 X[43209], X[42267] - 12 X[52048], 5 X[42271] + 9 X[43209], X[42271] + 18 X[52048], X[43209] - 10 X[52048], X[489] - 3 X[35948], X[489] + 3 X[45421], 2 X[7968] + X[35611], X[35642] + 2 X[49227], X[35857] + 2 X[48715], X[35883] + 2 X[48701], X[35825] + 2 X[49267], X[35879] + 2 X[49213], X[12376] + 2 X[49217], X[35827] + 2 X[49269], 3 X[11242] - X[12970], 6 X[11242] + X[35865], 3 X[11242] + X[49251], 2 X[12970] + X[35865], X[35835] - 4 X[46689], X[35829] + 2 X[49271], X[35881] + 2 X[49219]<br>
</b><p>
X(372) is the external center of similitude of the circumcircle and the 2nd Lemoine circle (cosine circle) (Peter J. C. Moses, 5/9/03).  Also, X(372) is the external center of similitude of the Gallatly circle (defined just before X(2007)) and the 1st Lemoine circle (Peter J. C. Moses, 9/10/03).
</p><p>
Let A'B'C' be the Lucas(-1) central triangle.  Let A&Prime; be the cevapoint of B' and C', and define B&Prime; and C&Prime; cyclically.  The lines AA&Prime;, BB&Prime;, CC&Prime; concur in X(372).  (Randy Hutson, July 23, 2015)
</p><p>
If you have The Geometer's Sketchpad, you can view <a href="X(372).gsp" class="bold">2nd Kenmotu Point</a>.
</p><p>
X(372) lies on the cubics K006, K233, K250, K337, K415, K424b, K633, K897, K1197, K1257, the curve Q168, and these lines: {1, 1703}, {2, 485}, {3, 6}, {4, 486}, {5, 615}, {8, 35842}, {10, 13975}, {11, </p><p>
X(372) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 45488}, {4, 8982}, {637, 20065}, {638, 43133}, {1152, 12969}, {3071, 42259}, {7968, 49227}, {12376, 35827}, {12970, 49251}, {32788, 41946}, {35611, 35642}, {35821, 42267}, {35825, 35879}, {35829, 35881}, {35857, 35883}, {35948, 45421}, {48701, 48715}, {49213, 49267}, {49217, 49269}, {49219, 49271}<br>
X(372) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 43121}, {315, 639}, {371, 32}, {638, 640}, {3071, 7584}, {10960, 42864}, {11824, 3}, {12376, 49269}, {12971, 49257}, {35611, 49227}, {35642, 7968}, {35699, 49215}, {35754, 49209}, {35821, 3071}, {35823, 32788}, {35825, 49213}, {35827, 49217}, {35829, 49219}, {35831, 49221}, {35833, 44648}, {35835, 49223}, {35837, 49225}, {35839, 49231}, {35841, 6}, {35843, 49233}, {35845, 49235}, {35847, 49239}, {35849, 49237}, {35851, 49211}, {35853, 49241}, {35855, 49243}, {35857, 48701}, {35859, 49245}, {35861, 49247}, {35863, 49249}, {35865, 49251}, {35867, 49253}, {35869, 49255}, {35871, 49259}, {35873, 49261}, {35875, 49263}, {35877, 49265}, {35879, 49267}, {35881, 49271}, {35883, 48715}, {39894, 49229}, {41946, 52048}, {42060, 642}, {42267, 42259}, {44485, 575}, {44501, 44481}, {49223, 46689}, {49602, 13936}<br>

X(372) = isotomic conjugate of X(34392)<br>
X(372) = complement of X(638)<br>
X(372) = anticomplement of X(640)<br>
X(372) = X(372) = circumcircle-inverse of X(2460<br>

X(372) = Schoutte-circle-inverse of X(6396)<br>
X(372) = 2nd-Brocard-circle-inverse of X(3102)<br>
X(372) = isogonal conjugate of the anticomplement of X(642)<br>
X(372) = isogonal conjugate of the complement of X(487)<br>
X(372) = isogonal conjugate of the isotomic conjugate of X(491)<br>
X(372) = isotomic conjugate of the polar conjugate of X(5412)<br>
X(372) = isogonal conjugate of the polar conjugate of X(1586)<br>
X(372) = polar conjugate of the isotomic conjugate of X(5409)<br>
X(372) = polar conjugate of the isogonal conjugate of X(26920)<br>
X(372) = Thomson-isogonal conjugate of X(13835)<br>
X(372) = orthic-isogonal conjugate of X(371)<br>
X(372) = psi-transform of X(7598)<br>
X(372) = X(31)-complementary conjugate of X(10960)<br>
X(372) = X(i)-Ceva conjugate of X(j) for these (i,j): {2, 10960}, {4, 371}, {491, 5409}, {589, 6}, {1586, 5412}, {3069, 8855}, {5413, 8854}, {5419, 6419}, {13439, 26875}, {18820, 8576}<br>
X(372) = X(i)-cross conjugate of X(j) for these (i,j): {1147, 371}, {12240, 4}, {26920, 5409}<br>
X(372) = X(i)-isoconjugate of X(j) for these (i,j): {1, 486}, {19, 11091}, {31, 34392}, {63, 41516}, {75, 8576}, {91, 371}, {92, 6414}, {158, 26922}, {485, 3378}, {1577, 39384}, {1585, 1820}, {1953, 16037}, {8769, 8940}, {19217, 24245}<br>
X(372) = X(i)-Dao conjugate of X(j) for these (i,j): {2, 10960}, {2, 34392}, {3, 486}, {6, 11091}, {69, 5408}, {206, 8576}, {371, 34116}, {372, 638}, {577, 5408}, {1147, 26922}, {1505, 42060}, {3162, 41516}, {5392, 24246}, {5409, 13430}, {6414, 22391}, {10962, 13428}<br>
X(372) = cevapoint of X(6) and X(10133)<br>
X(372) = crosspoint of X(i) and X(j) for these (i,j): {4, 13440}, {491, 1586}, {3373, 3374}<br>
X(372) = crosssum of X(i) and X(j) for these (i,j): {3, 10666}, {6, 3156}, {615, 8036}, {3371, 3372}, {6414, 8576}<br>
X(372) = crossdifference of every pair of points on line {523, 17432}<br>
X(372) = perspector of ABC and the Lucas(-1:1) tangents triangle<br>
X(372) = perspector of the tangential triangle and the Lucas(-1) central triangle<br>
X(372) = perspector of the Lucas(-1:1) inner tangential triangle and the Lucas central triangle<br>
X(372) = perspector of the Lucas(-4:3) central triangle and the circumcevian triangle of X(6)<br>
X(372) = perspector of the Lucas(-1:1) central triangle and cevian triangle of X(589)<br>
X(372) = radical center of the Lucas(-2:1) circles<br>
X(372) = perspector of ABC and 2nd Lucas secondary tangents triangle<br>
X(372) = perspector of tangential triangle and Lucas(-1) secondary central triangle<br>
X(372) = perspector of Lucas(-1) inner triangle and Lucas tangents triangle<br>
X(372) = inverse-in-2nd-Brocard-circle of X(3102)<br>
X(372) = inverse-in-Lucas(-1)-radical-circle of X(2459)<br>
X(372) = perspector of ABC and the free vertices of the Kenmotu squares (described at X(371))<br>
X(372) = insimilicenter of circumcircle and Lucas(-1) radical circle<br>
X(372) = barycentric product of circumcircle intercepts of inner Vecten circle<br>
